Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $10,001 to $50,000.

Description: Hartford Hospital entered into a $2,469,374 settlement agreement to resolve allegations that it submitted claims in which patients who received home health services within three days of the patients' release from Hartford were improperly coded as discharged rather than as a post-acute care transfer.
Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office of Inspector General
